programme.title: For the People
Za narod
programme.desc: For the People: Created by Paul William Davies. With Hope Davis, Ben Shenkman, Jasmin Savoy Brown, Susannah Flood. Set in the Southern District of New York Federal Court, brand new lawyers work for both the defense and the prosecution as they handle the most high profile and high stakes cases in the country - all as their personal lives intersect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6437276/","name":"For the People","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4MzAwNDgyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDEyMjE2NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in the Southern District of New York Federal Court, brand new lawyers work for both the defense and the prosecution as they handle the most high profile and high stakes cases in the country - all as their personal lives intersect","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6437276/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2018-04-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great pace, well directed, flaky screenplay, cheesy acting","reviewBody":"This show is losing my interest from the flaky screenplay/writing and moreso the cheesy acting. The overly ambitious 'God complexes' are annoying. Susannah Flood's character is unbearable, and to portray that everyone finds her attractive is ridiculous. Some of the dialog makes me cringe "you literally broke my brain"... really? programme.title: Warrior
Ratnik
programme.desc:
Warrior: Directed by Gavin O'Connor. With Joel Edgerton, Tom Hardy, Nick Nolte, Jennifer Morrison. The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1291584/","name":"Warrior","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk4ODk5MTMyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDMyNTg0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1291584/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wildaboutmovies"},"dateCreated":"2011-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best Fighting Movie Since Rocky","reviewBody":"I had the pleasure of seeing Warrior at 2011 CinemaCon, walking in not knowing a thing about the movie, other than it was a movie about 'fighting.' And though a MMA movie (Mixed Martial Arts), not boxing, per se, for the genre, fighting, Warrior delivers a much better story than The Fighter, and is on par with Clint Eastwood's Oscar winner, Million Dollar Baby.

Expect a Best Supporting Actor Oscar nod in 2012 for Nick Nolte. And superstar status for Tom Hardy.

Warrior, though a work of fiction, plays out like a true story; two brothers at odds with each other and their father, in the town of Pittsburgh, who resort to prize fighting, one for the money, the other to prove himself a man.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":450354,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2011-09-09","keywords":"tournament,father son relationship,martial arts tournament,mixed martial arts,brother brother relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Warrior","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi339320089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzMDY4MTU4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg3NjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzMDY4MTU4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg3NjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament -- a path that puts the fighter on a collision corner with his older brother. Nešto novo
programme.desc: Something New: Directed by Sanaa Hamri. With Sanaa Lathan, Fuzzy Fantabulous, Katharine Towne, Stanley DeSantis. Kenya McQueen, an accountant finds love in the most unexpected place when she agrees to go on a blind date with Brian Kelly, a sexy and free-spirited landscaper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0437777/","name":"Something New","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzNzU0NzQ1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTMzOTEzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kenya McQueen, an accountant finds love in the most unexpected place when she agrees to go on a blind date with Brian Kelly, a sexy and free-spirited landscaper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0437777/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bdorley"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Valentine Movie - Simon is hot - Sanaa is lovely","reviewBody":"I love this movie!!! What a great valentine story. My girlfriends and I laughed the whole movie through. It is a lovely, fun, serious and romantic movie all at the same time. I am totally in love with Simon Baker. He is hot. "Simon you can do my garden anytime, baby". I am glad to see that Hollywood has finally caught up to what is everyday life for the rest of us. Interracial dating is no longer a taboo nor is it 'sometinhg new.' Blacks and whites have been dating and getting married in America since the sixties. I'm just glad to see that Hollywood is big enough to show that black women are just as desirable as women of other races. Great job Sanaa and Simon. You two did a wonderful job making the relationship seem real. There was a natural on-screen chemistry between the two of you that made the movie believable and enjoyable. Sanaa is lovely in the film. I hope she gets the recognition she deserves in Hollywood. Peace...Bindu","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13147,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-02-03","keywords":"black woman white man kiss,black woman white man relationship,black woman white male,interracial kiss,interracial love","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Something New","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3643254297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGViNDk4YmUtYjczYi00ZWU3LTg4MTAtZTkyMjAwZDZlNGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGViNDk4YmUtYjczYi00ZWU3LTg4MTAtZTkyMjAwZDZlNGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005125/","name":"Sanaa Lathan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0048932/","name":"Simon Baker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112001/","name":"Golden Brooks"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065402/","name":"Sanaa Hamri"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018555/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069694/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0877701/","name":"Kriss Turner"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Step Up
Step Up
programme.desc: Step Up: Directed by Anne Fletcher. With Channing Tatum, Jenna Dewan, Damaine Radcliff, De'Shawn Washington. Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462590/","name":"Step Up","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzMzVhODgtOTc1NS00MmY3LWI3OGUtN2ZjNDEwM2ExZjJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462590/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kylah"},"dateCreated":"2006-08-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"An enjoyable movie!","reviewBody":"I thought this movie was really good. I'll admit the acting may not have been to it's full potential.. but I still thought it was pretty good. The movie is based on dancing and overall I thought the technique was very good. The talent displayed in this movie is extraordinary. The movie has romance, comedy, tragedy, and nearly everything else you would want in a good movie. The music in this movie is also really good. I would say this movie is well worth the money I spent. Step Up is inspirational and was everything I was expecting it to be. I'd highly recommend seeing it. If you enjoyed the movie Save The Last Dance this is probably a good movie for you. I found this movie to be very uplifting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113937,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2007-02-07","keywords":"title directed by female,dance school,dance movie,disney,community service","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1820374553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU1NzU5MjkwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk5NDkxMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU1NzU5MjkwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk5NDkxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Step Up"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1475594/","name":"Channing Tatum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1564087/","name":"Jenna Dewan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1690482/","name":"Damaine Radcliff"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281945/","name":"Anne Fletcher"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163665/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012137/","name":"Duane Adler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0742279/","name":"Melissa Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Indiana Jones: Otimači izgubljenog kovčega
programme.desc:
Raiders of the Lost Ark: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, Ronald Lacey. In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0082971/","name":"Raiders of the Lost Ark","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0ODEzMTc1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODM2MjAxNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0082971/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"belzebuebchen"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A blockbuster how it was meant to be","reviewBody":"Nowadays we keep forgetting how beautiful blockbusters can be. Too much CGI makes everything possible and therefore very often also arbitrary. In Raiders you actually seem to feel the physical pain some of the actors/stuntmen had to go through to provide 2 hours of pure entertainment.

Of course the story isn't waterproof, the Nazi weren't that present in Egypt in 1936 and how did Indy survive that ride on the submarine again? But lots of good and variable action scenes are accompanied by a story that develops fast and excitingly and is always close to being implausible but luckily never is. 

Spielberg, Lucas and most of all Harrison Ford created a hero that is nowadays iconic. With their attempt to make an homage to adventure comics of the 1930's they created their own legend. 

It's funny, exiting, thrilling and romantic. What more can you ask for?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":917508,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1981-12-25","keywords":"ark of the covenant,nazi,indiana jones,archeologist,damsel in distress","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official HD Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3747396377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGFhNTAyYjMtNGJlNi00NWFmLTllNTgtYzdhZjE5NmU4MTQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXJoYW5uYWg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGFhNTAyYjMtNGJlNi00NWFmLTllNTgtYzdhZjE5NmU4MTQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXJoYW5uYWg@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000261/","name":"Karen Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293550/","name":"Paul Freeman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071326/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001410/","name":"Lawrence Kasdan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000184/","name":"George Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442241/","name":"Philip Kaufman"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

Zgodna i (ne)zgodna
programme.desc:
The Hottie & the Nottie: Directed by Tom Putnam. With Paris Hilton, Joel David Moore, Christine Lakin, Johann Urb. A woman agrees to go on a date with a man only if he finds a suitor for her unattractive best friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0804492/","name":"The Hottie & the Nottie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2NDc1ODUxNDZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDQ1MjM1NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman agrees to go on a date with a man only if he finds a suitor for her unattractive best friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804492/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Meeker"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oh my that's bad","reviewBody":"I am just amazed that (as of this moment) there are 554 people who rated this movie a 10... 

I would like 10 pounds or 20 gallons of whatever it is that has warped their mentality to such a degree... 

Acting - Abysmal to Non-existent... Script - Huh? Wazzat? Directing - Not that I saw.

My only regret is that I cannot vote less than 1... 

Although I must say that I am quite satisfied that this flick has rocketed to the numero uno spot of the bottom 100...

programme.desc:
Charlie Wilson's War: Directed by Mike Nichols. With Tom Hanks, Amy Adams, Julia Roberts, Philip Seymour Hoffman. A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0472062/","name":"Charlie Wilson's War","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwMDgwMDc4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwOTU3MDM4._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0472062/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colinbarnard-1"},"dateCreated":"2007-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Sly, Sophisticated Piece of Film-making","reviewBody":"I like Tom Hanks, and he is one of few actors who will draw me into the theatre regardless of any misgivings I may have concerning the film. I worried about Mr. Hanks return to "light comedy" as this is the arena where he made the transition from TV to film- remember "Big"? Well, "Charlie Wilson's War" is not light comedy. It is political satire, and extremely well-written political satire at that. The script is the star of this film, and the word-smithing by Aaron Sorkin is some of the best on offer this year.

Mike Nicols holds the entire escapade together, delivering a film that zips along in a very quick 90 minutes (timing is everything in comedy, and nothing is ever funny if it drags). Nicols' choice in sets and lighting are also very reminiscent of '70's and '80's TV, a move used deliberately to root the piece in period.

The return to the use of model work and stock photography over digital special effects also enhances the retro look and believability. Note to the production designers in your choice of stock footage: I know the difference between an F-16 and a MiG, and a Bell and a Hind. But that may have been part of the joke, too.

I saw this film in Philadelphia. It was interesting to watch and listen to the audience NOT get the historical references to their own history. History tends to repeat because the recidivists have forgotten what happened the first time around.

Kudos to both Mr. Hanks and that chameleon Phillip Seymore Hoffman. Sorkin's script is brought to life by these actors, and the entire production team is on the top of their game.

Heartily recommended.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114558,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-02-27","keywords":"afghanistan,arms dealer,based on true story,mujahideen,soviet army","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Charlie Wilson's War","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi95551769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwODU2MjA1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMzNzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwODU2MjA1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMzNzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Charlie Wilson's War Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000450/","name":"Philip Seymour Hoffman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001566/","name":"Mike Nichols"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0815070/","name":"Aaron Sorkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1985741/","name":"George Crile"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Nebesko kraljevstvo
programme.desc:
Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Duk"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"excellent, fair to islam, sweeping, narrative could have used tightening...","reviewBody":"I really enjoyed this movie. The way the movie started in Europe and how dark it was there... and the journey to Jerusalem... just wonderful stuff up to that point.

Liam Neeson, as usual, is just SO GOOD, you wish he had more screen time.


* Orlando Bloom, actually surprisingly, was able to carry the movie as a lead. I was surprised he had the heft to do it, but I agree with the critic who said that the beard helped. He was a man, not a boy.



* Battle scenes... incredible. I was really surprised that they could wow me, since we've been numbed by the quality of battle scenes in so many previous movies, but they did a great job.



* Portrayal of the Muslims. EXTREMELY fair. In being "even-handed" to Christians and Muslims there, if anything, they emphasized the Christian fanatics (in the form of the Templars in particular, to simplify things) as being the "badguys" more than anyone else... (which is historically accurate to some degree, in my understanding). I was surprised and pleased that they tried to be accurate, and didn't try to emphasize some "BAD MUSLIMS" to make it "even".



* Movie is very secular in it's moralizing.


And it portrays Christianity particularly religious men, VERY badly (the Priest who steals the cross from Bloom's wife's corpse... the Bishop in Jerusalem who's ready to convert to Islam at the first sign of defeat... and who also wants to abandon the civilians... the knights templar...) I thought this got a tad gratuitous. There were really NO GOOD Christian FIGURES IN THE MOVIE. The only good purported Christians were basically acting Agnostic (Bloom, Neeson, etc.) The actual religious Christians were made out to be hypocrites.

Meanwhile Saladhudin was a man of honor.. but also somewhat moderate.


* Movie could definitely have a little more narrative focus and maybe have a little more of an emotional circle for Orlando Bloom character. The emotional arc is ALREADY complete fairly early in the movie (Bloom becomes a man of conscience)... and it's kind of boring since the character doesn't really move after that.


But the movie tackled a HUGE topic and tackled it fairly well. I just wish there was a better script to handle the compelling personal journey for Orlando Bloom (from widower, murderer seeking redemption, lost bastard son) that was PROMISED at the beginning.

It seems that as soon as he brings water to his father's old land, he's just about done his journey, and it turns into a simple historical battle movie. (but a darn good one)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":274954,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
Tajna podmornice K-19
programme.desc:
K-19: The Widowmaker: Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. With Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings, Christian Camargo, Roman Podhora. When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0267626/","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY2YjIwNDAtYjQwOC00YjY5LTk2MDUtMjY4ZDdiMjdlNjIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0267626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Oreolove"},"dateCreated":"2002-07-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the Most Moving War Films I've Ever Seen","reviewBody":"Despite some bad reviews, being the war film fanatic that I am, I went to see this movie. I was expecting something much like U-571, (Men trapped in a disabled boat surrounded by the enemy), and this movie wasn't far from it. I must say that U-571 is my all-time favorite war picture, so I didn't expect The Widowmaker to surpass it. However, it came very close. The story was told well and the acting from most of the newcomers was superb. However, when I left the theater, I didn't want to watch it again for a long while. Not that it was a bad movie. It was just a little too graphic. I'm one who can watch people get blown to bits, decapitated, and crushed, however, since this story is true and the way these men suffered before they died a horrible death, was a little too much for me to watch. I know they couldn't have filmed it any other way. That is what makes this movie so good... the mere fact that I was uneasy while watching it. I found myself gasping... (I'm not one to gasp.)

The film is based on the story of a Russian sea captain (Harrison Ford) that is ordered to command a new nuclear powered submarine that has been thrown together in a very short amount of time. The objective is to test a missile near the north pole in hopes that the Russian government can catch up to the US who is threatening nuclear war. Although the crew is hesitant to board the ship, they fear the captain's wrath and work without complaint. Of course, the captain is 'do or die' and works the crew mercilessly, much to the dismay of the ship's original captain (Liam Neeson), who can do nothing but watch as his crew gets ready for mutiny. When the nuclear generator malfunctions, it is up to a few brave men to expose themselves to radiation and try and fix the power before disaster strikes and World War 3 begins. What I found most disturbing was the captain's refusal for American help until 7 men were dead and hundreds more were already exposed to dangerous levels of radiation. Watching these brave men slow-cook themselves for the rest of the crew was enough to make me cringe, (while other men dove into freezing water rather than go back into a radioactive submarine.)

All in all, this movie was a bit too much reality for me. However, it was wonderfully written, directed, and acted. I gave it ********/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":61584,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-12-25","keywords":"radiation sickness,radioactive contamination,soviet union,submarine,nuclear submarine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153606425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for K-19: The Widowmaker"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819874/","name":"Sam Spruell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824220/","name":"Peter Stebbings"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000941/","name":"Kathryn Bigelow"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019266/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637491/","name":"Louis Nowra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477370/","name":"Christopher Kyle"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0267626, Title: K-19: The Widowmaker, --- Description: K-19: The Widowmaker: Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. With Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings, Christian Camargo, Roman Podhora. When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0267626/","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY2YjIwNDAtYjQwOC00YjY5LTk2MDUtMjY4ZDdiMjdlNjIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0267626/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Oreolove","dateCreated":"2002-07-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the Most Moving War Films I've Ever Seen","reviewBody":"Despite some bad reviews, being the war film fanatic that I am, I went to see this movie. I was expecting something much like U-571, (Men trapped in a disabled boat surrounded by the enemy), and this movie wasn't far from it. I must say that U-571 is my all-time favorite war picture, so I didn't expect The Widowmaker to surpass it. However, it came very close. The story was told well and the acting from most of the newcomers was superb. However, when I left the theater, I didn't want to watch it again for a long while. Not that it was a bad movie. It was just a little too graphic. I'm one who can watch people get blown to bits, decapitated, and crushed, however, since this story is true and the way these men suffered before they died a horrible death, was a little too much for me to watch. I know they couldn't have filmed it any other way. That is what makes this movie so good... the mere fact that I was uneasy while watching it. I found myself gasping... (I'm not one to gasp.)

The film is based on the story of a Russian sea captain (Harrison Ford) that is ordered to command a new nuclear powered submarine that has been thrown together in a very short amount of time. The objective is to test a missile near the north pole in hopes that the Russian government can catch up to the US who is threatening nuclear war. Although the crew is hesitant to board the ship, they fear the captain's wrath and work without complaint. Of course, the captain is 'do or die' and works the crew mercilessly, much to the dismay of the ship's original captain (Liam Neeson), who can do nothing but watch as his crew gets ready for mutiny. When the nuclear generator malfunctions, it is up to a few brave men to expose themselves to radiation and try and fix the power before disaster strikes and World War 3 begins. What I found most disturbing was the captain's refusal for American help until 7 men were dead and hundreds more were already exposed to dangerous levels of radiation. Watching these brave men slow-cook themselves for the rest of the crew was enough to make me cringe, (while other men dove into freezing water rather than go back into a radioactive submarine.)

All in all, this movie was a bit too much reality for me. However, it was wonderfully written, directed, and acted. I gave it ********/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":61584,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-12-25","keywords":"radiation sickness,radioactive contamination,soviet union,submarine,nuclear submarine","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153606425","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for K-19: The Widowmaker","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819874/","name":"Sam Spruell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824220/","name":"Peter Stebbings"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000941/","name":"Kathryn Bigelow"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029472/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019266/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637491/","name":"Louis Nowra","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477370/","name":"Christopher Kyle"],"duration":"PT2H18M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
Neprijatelj pred vratima
programme.desc:
Enemy at the Gates: Directed by Jean-Jacques Annaud. With Jude Law, Ed Harris, Rachel Weisz, Joseph Fiennes. A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0215750/","name":"Enemy at the Gates","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWFlY2E3ODQtZWNiNi00ZGU4LTkzNWEtZTQ2ZTViMWRhYjIzL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0215750/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"A_Different_Drummer"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"brilliantly flawed ... is still brilliant","reviewBody":"In the grand tradition of Old Hollywood, this international co-production seeks to frame the key battle of WW2 (the REAL key battle, not the ones from the John Wayne movies) as a morality tale involving a love triangle.

It is a bold idea, and beautifully executed.

In fact an argument could be made -- and I will make it -- that any flaws in the execution (it lags a bit here and there) are the result of the film-makers' "reach exceeding their grasp" and they attempted too much, more than one film could ever accomplish.

But what a film it is! You viewer feel as though you are there, making history. The four stars involved have, each of them, never given a bad performance in their careers and they surely maintain their records here.

Ed Harris in particular -- although he has less screen time -- will always to this reviewer seem a vastly under-rated actor. (This review written in 2017 where an older Harris still uses his charisma in a defining role for HBOs Westworld .... and nails it.) Recommended? Absolutely! In the Metacritic data that IMDb so helpfully provides I could not help but notice one reviewer commenting that, well, it sure isn't in the same class as SAVING PRIVATE RYAN.

Which is the irony of doing film reviews. I have never not once thought of wanting to see SAVING PRIVATE RYAN again, but this film is one I like to revisit every few years. Magnificent.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":251504,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","History","War"],"datePublished":"2002-05-01","keywords":"sniper,stalingrad,battle,world war two soldier,weapon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Enemy at the Gates","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1218773273","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzQ4NzVlZGYtMDBkZS00OTJmLWExYzItZWM2Zjc0NTYwYTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzQ4NzVlZGYtMDBkZS00OTJmLWExYzItZWM2Zjc0NTYwYTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "Coming Soon""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000438/","name":"Ed Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001212/","name":"Joseph Fiennes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000269/","name":"Jean-Jacques Annaud"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013922/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076287/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000269/","name":"Jean-Jacques Annaud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323708/","name":"Alain Godard"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ladrón que roba a ladrón
Lopov koji je opljačkao lopova
programme.desc:
Ladrón que roba a ladrón: Directed by Joe Menendez. With Fernando Colunga, Miguel Varoni, Saúl Lisazo, Ivonne Montero. Two former thieves reunite to rob the biggest thief they know -- Moctesuma Valdez, a TV infomercial guru who's made millions selling worthless health products to poor Latino immigrants. When none of their affiliates want to go undercover as day laborers to pull off the heist, the two men turn to the real thing for help." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0859760/","name":"Ladrón que roba a ladrón","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg4ODE4NzgyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDM3Nzk0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two former thieves reunite to rob the biggest thief they know -- Moctesuma Valdez, a TV infomercial guru who's made millions selling worthless health products to poor Latino immigrants. When none of their affiliates want to go underc","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0859760/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"arudb"},"dateCreated":"2008-04-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"More like Knights of Prosperity than Ocean's Eleven","reviewBody":"I was born in the US to immigrant parents and while I don't care for telenovelas or the typical overracting that is present in Latin entertainment, I really enjoyed this movie.

While it may seem to be a wannabe Ocean's 11, you also have to bear in mind that the recent O11 movies are also knockoff's of an original movie made in the 60's. I don't think that this movie is in any way trying to set itself apart or claim complete originality. The formulas have been used in many movies in the past, present and will continue to be used in the future.

What sets this movie apart is how the subject appeals to a broad group of people on a personal level. This is not the type of movie that could truly appeal to non-Latinos because they have no emotional investment in the storyline. While there may have been a few things that others would consider predictable, it was still worthwhile to view. I think that if non-Latinos could understand the struggles that Latinos endure trying to come to the US, they would have a deeper understanding of what it means to get back at someone who robs their own people.

I think that if I did not speak Spanish I would probably not appreciate the film as much. The nuances in tone and inflection by some of the actors, particularly Oscar Torres, are just outstanding. I loved watching him on the screen and hope to see him in more movies. I think that his character alone, led the audience to an uncertainty of the outcome of the heist. The other actors, popular in the world of Telenovelas, still had some very good performances.

Personally , I would not really compare this to Ocean's Eleven, Italian Job or any of those types of heist movies. Those movies had an air of sophistication that is entirely different than LQRL. I would compare LQRL more to the Donal Logue show, Knights of Prosperity. Equally zany, hilarious and in some cases the performances are so nonsensical you can't do anything but laugh your @ss off.

The ending is of a different type than most heist movies in that it circles back and closes well.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1892,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-31","keywords":"immigrant,infomercial,vault,plan,nanny","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0173393/","name":"Fernando Colunga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0890173/","name":"Miguel Varoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1194672/","name":"Julie Gonzalo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0994553/","name":"Joe Menendez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177895/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1045546/","name":"JoJo Henrickson"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Step Up 2: The Streets: Directed by Jon M. Chu. With Briana Evigan, Robert Hoffman, Adam Sevani, Cassie Ventura. Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1023481/","name":"Step Up 2: The Streets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NzYxOTgxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgxMjc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1023481/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sampodog"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Way better than I expected!","reviewBody":"I certainly didn't have high expectations for this movie, but I figured the dancing would be fun. My expectations were exceeded, WAY exceeded. Sure it has a predictable plot and it's nothing more than a right-side-of-the-tracks/wrong-side-of-the-tracks love story (Pretty in Pink, West Side Story, Romeo & Juliet, etc.), but the dancing was really incredible. I'm way older than the target audience and yet I thoroughly enjoyed this movie.\n\nIf you're looking for groundbreaking plot, acting, or directing, you won't find it here. But the acting/directing was just fine, and the dancing was stellar. If you're concerned with the acting, I guess that would be like going to an action movie and judging it based on the acting rather than the action.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85290,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-06-04","keywords":"dance off,dancing in the rain,dance movie,dance audition,dance crew","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 2 the Streets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1253179673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Step Up 2 the Streets Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1382207/","name":"Robert Hoffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0263759/","name":"Briana Evigan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0144260/","name":"Cassie Ventura"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160840/","name":"Jon M. IMDb data; ttnr: 1023481, Title: Step Up 2: The Streets, --- Description: Step Up 2: The Streets: Directed by Jon M. Chu. With Briana Evigan, Robert Hoffman, Adam Sevani, Cassie Ventura. Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1023481/","name":"Step Up 2: The Streets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NzYxOTgxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgxMjc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1023481/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sampodog","dateCreated":"2008-02-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Way better than I expected!","reviewBody":"I certainly didn't have high expectations for this movie, but I figured the dancing would be fun. My expectations were exceeded, WAY exceeded. Sure it has a predictable plot and it's nothing more than a right-side-of-the-tracks/wrong-side-of-the-tracks love story (Pretty in Pink, West Side Story, Romeo & Juliet, etc.), but the dancing was really incredible. I'm way older than the target audience and yet I thoroughly enjoyed this movie.\n\nIf you're looking for groundbreaking plot, acting, or directing, you won't find it here. But the acting/directing was just fine, and the dancing was stellar. If you're concerned with the acting, I guess that would be like going to an action movie and judging it based on the acting rather than the action.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85290,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-06-04","keywords":"dance off,dancing in the rain,dance movie,dance audition,dance crew","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 2 the Streets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1253179673","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Step Up 2 the Streets Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1382207/","name":"Robert Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0263759/","name":"Briana Evigan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0144260/","name":"Cassie Ventura"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160840/","name":"Jon M. programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones i ukleti hram
programme.desc:
Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan, Amrish Puri. In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087469/","name":"Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI1NTk2ZWMtMmI0YS00Yzg0LTljMzgtZTg4YjkyY2E5Zjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087469/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jhaggardjr"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Prequel to "Raiders of the Lost Ark"","reviewBody":"It's funny to call "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" a followup to "Raiders of the Lost Ark". This film is a prequel to the 1981 smash hit, a movie where the events that take place actually took place before the events in "Raiders". Notice at the beginning of "Raiders" that the year is 1936. In "Temple of Doom", the year is 1935. See what I mean? "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" is another rollercoaster ride of a movie brought to life by Steven Spielberg and George Lucas. Harrison Ford is back as archaeologist Indiana Jones who this time searches for a sacred stone that was stolen from an Indian village. Along for the ride is American singer/entertainer Willie Scott (Kate Capshaw, aka Mrs. Steven Spielberg) and little Chinese sidekick Short Round (Ke Huy Quan). On their way to finding the stone they stumble across a palace that leads to the gateway of the Temple of Doom run by an evil Thugee cult. The action and special effects are first-rate as you would expect, though the story is a tad weaker than it was in "Raiders". Plus, Capshaw's performance leaves something to be desired. She goes so far over-the-top in some scenes that you'd wish Karen Allen would show up as Marion. Nevertheless, Capshaw isn't all that bad. She does make an impression during the times when she's not screaming. But Ke Huy Quan (now known as Jonathan Ke Quan) comes off better as Indy's young sidekick. The following year he starred in the Spielberg produced Richard Donner directed "The Goonies", but then didn't appear in much after that. "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" is great fun only if you can get by Kate Capshaw's simpering wimpering character or the over-the-top violence. I found it to be exciting from beginning to end.

***1/2 (out of four)

POINT OF INTEREST: this was the film that lead to the creation of the PG-13 rating in 1984 (along with Spielberg's other 1984 movie "Gremlins"). Both "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" and "Gremlins" feature violence that most people felt was too strong for a PG rating, though the MPAA felt that it wasn't strong enough to merit an R rating (other Spielberg movies that got PG ratings that were quite intense were "Jaws", "Poltergeist", and the original "Raiders of the Lost Ark"). So after "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" and "Gremlins" opened in theaters at the beginning of the summer movie season of 1984 and became two of that year's biggest hits, the MPAA realized a new rating had to be created. The PG-13 rating was born. In August 1984, the first movies were released with the new PG-13 rating ("Red Dawn" and "The Woman in Red"). It's not a new rating anymore. The PG-13 rating has held up very well these last 18 years and it'll still go strong in the years to come. But I'll always remember "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" as the leading factor to the creation of the PG-13 rating.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":465436,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1984-05-23","keywords":"india,prequel,shanghai china,indiana jones character,hand through chest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2444476697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E5ZTE3OTItMThmZC00ZjdhLWExMDEtZWQ5MDFjMmM5NjJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E5ZTE3OTItMThmZC00ZjdhLWExMDEtZWQ5MDFjMmM5NjJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001009/","name":"Kate Capshaw"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702841/","name":"Ke Huy Quan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071326/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0404754/","name":"Willard Huyck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0441718/","name":"Gloria Katz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000184/","name":"George Lucas"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
Svakog gosta tri dana dosta
programme.desc:
You, Me and Dupree: Directed by Anthony Russo, Joe Russo. With Owen Wilson, Kate Hudson, Matt Dillon, Michael Douglas. A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0463034/","name":"You, Me and Dupree","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxOTg0MzczOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODk1MTQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0463034/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MovieDude1893"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"2- laugh riddled, solid hours at the Multiplex.","reviewBody":"'You Me and Dupree', the new comedy starring the Texas charmer Owen Wilson, represents two of the breeziest hours in film this year.

Quirky and funny 'You Me and Dupree' might be a film likely to catch you by surprise. It involves two newlyweds (Dillon and Hudson) and their oafish house guest Dupree (Wilson), who is turning their new world upside down.

I can't tell you what makes 'Dupree' tick so well, but something does. As far as plotting nothing seemed to be "filler" to me. Everything seems to drive the plot forward. Though it might just be "going through the paces" the film makes those paces as quick and lively as possible.

Performance wise, Wilson brings the right amount of charm needed for us to accept Dupree. Dillon and Hudson are solid in thankless roles. And Douglas creates a good supporting character of Hudson's father and Dillon's boss. I'd also like to point out the effortless comedic flow of 'The 40 Year Old Virgin' 's Seth Rogen also seen here.

In closing, 'Dupree' represents some very breezy summer fun in the air conditioned comfort of a theater.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80102,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-11-08","keywords":"reference to audrey hepburn,reference to lance armstrong,cycling accident,road cycling,newlywed couple","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"You, Me and Dupree","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2214527257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFiODIwOWUtNDY4Ni00MWI4LTgyNTQtMmRlZDYwYmMwM2NjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFiODIwOWUtNDY4Ni00MWI4LTgyNTQtMmRlZDYwYmMwM2NjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Universal Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005028/","name":"Kate Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000369/","name":"Matt Dillon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0751577/","name":"Anthony Russo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0751648/","name":"Joe Russo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239930/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1942829/","name":"Michael LeSieur"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kiss of the Dragon
Zmajev poljubac
programme.desc:
Kiss of the Dragon: Directed by Chris Nahon. With Jet Li, Bridget Fonda, Tchéky Karyo, Ric Young. A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0271027/","name":"Kiss of the Dragon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM0ZDIxNDYtZDJjMy00NTc5LWIyMTgtMzBhNGRiZTU0ZmRjL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0271027/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not Your Normal Martial Arts Fare","reviewBody":"I expect most of these Hong Kong martial-arts films to be packed with action but most feature either a little humor (Jackie Chan) or beautiful scenery ("Hero," etc.) or wild special effects ("Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon" and more).....but this one features a mean edge. I'm not used to seeing these Asian films with a lot of profanity (mainly f-words) or bloody scenes almost to the point of being gross, which one scene was in here.

The hero is likable guy played by Jet Li. Despite his martial arts penchant for violence, he has a soft, boyish look to him and doesn't seem to fit the type. He's always the gentleman in here, with no profanity either. The villains, led by Tchecky Karyo, are brutal. Bridget Fonda, playing a hooker, at least wasn't some "Pretty Woman" type figure. She was rough, too, but at least realistic and I give her credit for not worrying about how she looked in here, beauty-wise.

I don't regret seeing this film. It was entertaining, but beware: it's a rough movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":62442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-03-20","keywords":"chinese,action hero,one man army,forced prostitution,title spoken by character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kiss of the Dragon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1549730329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc2ZjhhNjYtNWE1ZC00YjE0LTlmZTAtMjIyZjVhNWNhMmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc2ZjhhNjYtNWE1ZC00YjE0LTlmZTAtMjIyZjVhNWNhMmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this thriller about an international conspiracy"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001472/","name":"Jet Li"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000403/","name":"Bridget Fonda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001409/","name":"Tchéky Karyo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0619599/","name":"Chris Nahon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048273/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001472/","name":"Jet Li"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000108/","name":"Luc Besson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436543/","name":"Robert Mark Kamen"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Pamela Anderson, Temuera Morrison, Victoria Rowell, Jack Noseworthy, Xander Berkeley, Udo Kier, Steve Railsback

programme.title: I talentuari
programme.desc: Caleb Steinmeyer, Zulay Henao. I rritur në rrugët e Nju Jork-ut, një djalosh që në vogëli ishte dëshmitar i vrasjes brutale të së ëmës, fillon të kërkojë fajtorët për t'u hakmarrë me të njëjtën mënyrë...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Objektivi i Padukshëm
programme.desc: Tre policë, bashkojnë forcat për të shkatërruar një bandë grabitësish, të cilët ndërkohë që kryejnë vjedhje vrasin edhe njerëz të pafajshëm.
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Sulmi
programme.desc: Vincent Elbaz, Grégori Derangère. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të sulmit që kryen forcat speciale franceze, për të neutralizuar terroristët që moren peng një avion në vitin 1994.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Bërthama e Tokës
programme.desc: Hilary Swank, Aaron Eckhart. Kur bërthama e Tokës, ndalon së rrotulluari, një grup shkencëtarësh nisen për në qendër të saj me qëllim që të shpëthejnë një mekanizëm bëthamor dhe të rikthejnë gjithçka në normalitet.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Mythica 1-Në kërkim të heronjve
programme.desc: Melanie Stone, Adam Johnson. Një vajzë e re që ëndërron të bëhet magjistare takohet me një priftëreshë bukuroshe, e cila e fut në një aventurë plot magji e rreziqe.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Dy adoleshentët
programme.desc: Dy adoleshentë të larguar nga shtëpia, të cilët përpiqen të mbijetojnë në rrugë me të gjitha mënyrat, bëjnë gabimin më të madh kur joshin një burrë dhe e çojnë në një motel për t'i marrë paratë...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Burrat me të zeza I
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith. Dy super-agjente ne ndjekje te terroristeve aliene qe rrezikojne t'i japin fund botes. Nje perzierje humori, betejash masive dhe efektesh speciale.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkence

programme.title: Koordinatori
programme.desc: 2016. Grushti i shtetit ndaj një Presidentit të ri të Evropës Lindore, aktivizon një agjent të fshehtë amerikan të luftojë kundër një udhëheqësi ushtarak, që kërkon të rrëzojë demokracinë e sapovendosur.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Pas perëndimit
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Woody Harrelson. Grabitësi Max Burdet dhe e dashura, kanë vendosur të dalin në pension në një ishull përrallor. Por agjenti që s'u ndahet në asnjë hap Stan Lloyd, beson se kjo është thjesht puna e radhës.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Ushtari universal
programme.desc: J.C.Van Damme. Ushtaret e mijevjeçarit te ri jane pothuajse te perkryer, pothuajse si njerez te vertete dhe gati nen kontrollin tone. Njeri prej tyre do t'i udheheqe ne lufte kunder njerezimit dhe i vetmi qe mund t'i ndaloje, do te rikthehet...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Skuadra Bishtkuqët
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr., Gerald McRaney. Gjatë Luftës së Dytë Botërore, një grup pilotësh afrikano-amerikanë, duhet të luftojnë dy beteja në të njëjtën kohë: atë me armikun dhe diskriminimin racial.
programme.category: Aksion
luftë

programme.title: Mbledhësit e borxheve 2
programme.desc: Scott Adkins, Louis Mandylor. Dyshja e mbledhësve të borxheve duhet të marrin paratë e vjedhura të shefit të tyre dhe të luftojnë me një bos droge hakmarrës, ndërsa përballen me rreziqe të papritura që u vijnë nga të gjitha anët.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kështjella e rërës
programme.desc: Nicholas Hoult. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Pas pushtimit të Irakut në vitin 2003, toga e një ushtari pa përvojë dërgohet në një mision të rrezikshëm për të riparuar sistemin e ujit të një fshati armiqësor.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë

programme.title: Njeriu pa të shkuar
programme.desc: 2010. Një njeri që do të donte të harronte të kaluarën e tij, miqësohet me një fëmijë të lënë pas dore. Por kur fëmija rrëmbehet nga një bandë kriminale, ai fillon një mision të rrezikshëm për ta shpëtuar me çdo kusht...
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Goditur nga rrufeja
programme.desc: Chris Colfer, Rebel Wilson. Një adoleshent, aspiratat e të cilit ndërpiten kur goditet nga rrufeja, ritregon nga jeta e përtejme për vështirësitë e të qenit në një shkollë ku askush nuk e kupton e në shtëpi e presin prindërit aspak normalë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Krenarë nga Kampton
programme.desc: 2015. Kandidat për çmim Oskar. Ngritja dhe rënia e grupit të repit, N.W.A dhe anëtarëve të tij: Eazy-E, Ice Cube dhe Dr. Dre. Djemtë e rinj nga Los Anxhelosi kthyen zemërimin dhe zhgënjimin në armën më të fuqishme që mund të imagjinohet: muzika.
programme.category: Dramë
biografi

programme.title: Helena
programme.desc: Ashley Judd, Goran Visnjic. Një profesore e talentuar, e cila në pamje të parë duket se ka gjithçka, detyrohet të përballet me depresionin e saj, që rrezikon të rrënojë çdo gjë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Njerëz të trazuar
programme.desc: Jamie Dornan, Lola Kirke, Billy Crystal. Dikur e konsideruar adoleshente gjeni, një grua e konsumuar nga veset, përpiqet të rindërtojë jetën e saj. Lidhja e saj me një burrë me të kaluarën e trazuar do ta njohë atë më mirë me vetveten..
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Në kujtim të motrës sonë
programme.desc: Një familje që përpiqet të përballojë vdekjen e motrës së tyre, nis një udhëtim përgjatë vendit për të mbledhur sendet e saj dhe për të bashkuar kujtimet që ata kishin me personin që humbën.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Romancë në safari
programme.desc: Pasi trashëgon një rezervat me kafshë të egra në Afrikën e jugut, Kiara mendon ta shesë. Kujdestari i tokës do të përpiqet ta njohë më mirë me vendin, me shpresë se ajo do të bie në dashuri me tokën, kafshet, ndoshta edhe me të...
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Ali dhe Nino
programme.desc: Në Azerbajxhan e vitit 1914, një i ri musliman dhe një princeshë katolike luftojnë për dashurinë e tyre mes tensioneve familjare, tradhtive tronditëse dhe fillimeve të Luftës së Parë Botërore.
programme.category: Dramë
luftë

programme.title: Kur gjithçka humbet
programme.desc: Me Robert Redford. I vetëm në një udhëtim në oqeanin Indian, nje marinar veteran pasi përplaset me një kontenier, kupton se duhet të përballet me sfidën pothuajse të pamundur, për të mbijetuar...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Të duash një fëmijë
programme.desc: Kathryn Hahn, Paul Giamatti. Një çift në kufijtë e fertilititetit futet gjithmonë e më thellë në botën e vështirë të mjekësisë riprodhuese dhe birësimit, duke vendosur martesën e tyre në rrezik.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Çmimi i besimit
programme.desc: Edhe pse 18-vjeçari Brendan Kings përpiqet të hedhë pas krahëve jetën e trazuar në një bandë, e kaluara vazhdon të kërcënojë besimin e sapogjetur, familjen dhe të ardhmen e tij.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Pafundësisht Ari Polar
programme.desc: 2014. Mark Ruffalo, Zoe Saldana. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë. Një njeri që vuan nga çrregullimi bipolar, përpiqet të rifitojë zemrën e gruas duke marrë përsipër që të kujdeset për dy vajzat e tyre, ndërkohë që ajo ndodhet në një qytet tjetër.
programme.category: Drame
komedi

programme.title: Pothuajse të famshëm
programme.desc: Nje djale 15 vjeçar fanatik i muzikes arrin te behet reporter i njeres prej revistave me ne mode te kohes, Rolling Stone. Ai shkon te intervistoje grupin e famshem Stillwater, qellim i cili kthehet ne nje mesim te vlefshem per jeten.
programme.category: Dramë
muzikë

programme.title: Gënjeshtrat e Hollivudit
programme.desc: Kur Cole Masten, ylli i Hollivudit aq i pëlqyer nga femrat, mbërrin në një qytezë jugore për të xhiruar një film, ai bie në dashuri me të vetmen vajzë që duket se atë nuk e duron dot.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Në kërkim të njerëzve të egër
programme.desc: 2016. Sam Neill, Julian Dennison. Kur një djalosh rebel dhe njeriu që po kujdeset për të marrin arratinë në pyjet e Zelandës së Re, fillon një kërkim kombëtar për t'i gjetur një orë e më parë...
programme.category: Komedi
aventurë

programme.title: Turpi
programme.desc: John Malkovich, Jessica Haines. Pas një lidhjeje seksuale me një studente, një profesor në Afrikën e Jugut, shkon të gjejë paqe në fermën e vajzës së tij, por do të përballet me trazirat dhe pasojat që erdhën pas periudhës së Aparteidit.
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Shenjtorë dhe mëkatarë
programme.desc: Pas vdekjes së djalit dhe dështimit të martesës së tij, detektivi Sean Riley detyrohet të punojë me detektivin e krimeve Will Ganz, mbi një sërë vrasjesh brutale. Por do të zbulojë, se pas ketyre vrasjeve, fshihet diçka më e madhe. Titrat shqip-angl.
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Fati nën pemën e Krishtlindjes
programme.desc: Candace Cameron Bure, Paul Greene. Një vajzë në prag martese, detyrohet të fillojë një udhëtim drejt Nju Jorkut me një djalë zemërthyer dhe një çift të vjetër në moshë dhe përgjatë rrugës, secili mëson shumë për njëri-tjetrin, por edhe për veten.
programme.category: Romancë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Banditët amerikane
programme.desc: Viti i prodhimit 2010. Peter Fonda, Tim Abell, George Stults. Banditët legjendarë Frenk dhe Xhesi Xhejms, do te vihen përballë një marshalli që nuk ndalet para asgjëje për t'i vënë para drejtësisë...
programme.category: Western Night

programme.title: 50 takime të para
programme.desc: A.Sandler, D.Barrymore. Henry Roth është veteriner dhe vdes për shoqerine e femrave, por një ditë ai do ta lërë pas kraheve jetën prej playboy-i sepse bie në dashuri me Lucy-n, e cila vuan shpesh nga humbja e kujteses. Titra shqip-anglisht.
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Twilight Saga - Hëna e re
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson. Kapitulli i dytë i sagës Twilight, bazuar në romanin e Stephenie Meyer. Bukuroshja Bela Suon, futet më thellë në botën e mistershme të vampirit Eduard. Një botë e magjishme por dhe tepër e rrezikshme.
programme.category: Fantazi
romancë-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Më i shpejti
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson, Billy Bob Thornton. Për vite me radhë pas hekurave të burgut, një njeri ka planifikuar vetëm një gjë: të hakmerret për vrasjen e të vëllait. Tani i lirë, ai ka vetëm një qëllim, të eliminojë një nga një, fajtorët.Titra shqip-anglish.
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. ang

programme.title: Djali një milion dollarësh
programme.desc: Një agjent sportistësh krijon një strategji të pazakontë rekrutimi që t'iu mundësojë lojtarëve indianë të kriketit aktivizimin në ligën amerikane të bejzbollit.
programme.category: Biografi
sport-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Koleksionisti i kockave
programme.desc: Nje ekspert kriminalistike (Denzel Washinton) dhe nje detektive (Angelina Jolie) do te vihen ne kerkim te nje vrasesi serial dhe do te zbulojne nje te kaluar te erret.
programme.category: Thriller dramatik-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Ish
programme.desc: Me Claudia Gerini, Flavio Insinna, Silvio Orlando, Nancy Brilli, Alessandro Gassman etj... Historitë e dashurisë së gjashtë çifteve, të lindura, zhvilluara dhe ndërthurura prej Krishtlindjeve deri në festën e Shën Valentinit...
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. ang

programme.title: Nderi i hajdutit
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman, Antonio Banderas. Një hajdut profesionist, që punon sipas një kodi të caktuar nderi, rekruton një partner të ri që ta ndihmojë në një vjedhje të fundit, në mënyrë që t'i mbyllë përfundimisht borxhet me një bandë ruse.
programme.category: Krim-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Plazhi
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio, Virginie Ledoyen. Me një hartë në dorë, që tregon për një ishull përrallor, një i ri i shoqëruar edhe nga një djale e një vajzë nisen në kërkim të parajsës. Por edhe në parajsë, jo çdo gjë shkon në mënyrë perfekte.
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Udhëtimi imagjinar
programme.desc: Edward Hogg, Simon Farnaby. Një i ri që s'ka dale nga shtëpia prej kohësh, ndërmerr një udhëtim imagjinar, bazuar në eksperiencat dhe kujtimet e një udhëtimi të kaluar.
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Kasollja
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin bestseller të New York Times. Pas një tragjedie familjare, një njeri merr një letër misterioze që e fton të vizitojë një kasolle. Atje takon 3 të panjohur, të cilët e ndihmojnë të kuptojë më mirë dhimbjen e tij.
programme.category: Dramë
fantazi

programme.title: Zonja Makbeth
programme.desc: Kandidat për 2 çmime Bafta dhe 37 çmime të tjera. Në Anglinë e shekullit të 19-të, një vajzë e martuar me dikë shumë më të madh në moshë, zbulon një ndjenjë të pandalshme kur fillon një romancë të zjarrtë me një punëtor të fermës së familjes së saj.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Mbi bazën e seksit
programme.desc: Kandidate për çmim 'Oskar' Felicity Jones. Historia e vërtetë frymëzuese e avoketes së re Ruth Bader, e cila paraqiti një çështje revolucionare pëpara Gjykatës së Alepit të Shteteve të Bashkuara dhe përmbysi një shekull diskriminim gjinor.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Dhuntia e errët
programme.desc: Amandla Stenberg, Mandy Moore. Pasi adoleshentët me fuqi misterioze ndalohen nga qeveria, Rubi, një nga më të fuqishmet, arratiset dhe bashkohet me një grup të larguarish, në një rezistencë për të marrë në dorë e fatit të tyre...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Mbrëmja e maturës
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, James Corden, Nicole Kidman. Një grup aktorësh të famshëm të Broadway, nisen drejt një qyteti të vogël për të ndihmuar një vajzë adoleshente, të cilës i mohohet e drejta të shkojë në mbrëmjen e maturës...
programme.category: Komedi

dramë

programme.title: Prapësia
programme.desc: Keira Knightley. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Konkursi 'Miss Bota', 1970 bëri histori pasi Lëvizja e Çlirimit të Grave prishi transmetimin e drejtpërdrejtë. Por kur shfaqja rifilloi, shpallja e fitueses shkaktoi zhurmë akoma më të madhe.

programme.title: Me ritmin e ëndrrave
programme.desc: Kur pranimi në universitetin e ëndrrave varet nga performanca e saj në një konkurs vallëzimi, një vajzë studioze formon një grup kërcimi për të mundur skuadrën më të mirë në shkollë. Tani asaj i duhet thjesht të mësojë si të kërcejë.

programme.title: Breshkat adoleshente ninxha 2
programme.desc: Breshkat adoleshente ninxha rikthehen për të shpëtuar sërish Nju Jorkun. Ndërkohë që armiku i tyre i betuar Shrederi bashkon forcat me një shkencëtar dhe 2 mutantët e tij, ata përballen me një rrezik akoma më të madh - famëkeqin Krang.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Vrapo, Fshihu, Lufto
programme.desc: Me Radha Mitchell. 17-vjeçarja Zoe, përdor zgjuarsinë dhe aftësitë e saj të mbijetesës, për të shpëtuar veten dhe shokë e saj të gjimnazit, kundër 4 studentëve të armatosur, që kanë nisur një masakër brenda shkollës së saj...
programme.category: Thriller
