programme.title: Pasi u njohëm
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin best-seller të Anna Todd-it. Kur Tesa, një vajzë e mbarë dhe me ambicje, takohet me rebelin tërheqës Hardin Skot, do të fillojë të dyshojë mbi gjithçka që ajo mendonte për veten dhe mbi atë që dëshironte nga jeta.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Tolo Tolo
programme.desc: Checco Zalone. Pasi largohet nga atdheu prej problemeve financiare, Keko gjen mikëpritje në Afrikë. Por situata delikate politike e detyron atë të largohet sërish dhe të ndërrmarrë udhëtimin e trazuar të emigrantëve për t'u kthyer në Itali.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Të përjashtuarit
programme.desc: Dy gjimnaziste peshkope planifikojnë hakmarrjen e tyre pasi bien viktimë e shakasë poshtëruese të një prej studenteve me popullore të shkollës.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mr. Bean, gëzuar Krishtlindjen
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Kafsha
programme.desc: Marvin Meinxh gjithmonë donte t'i ndihmonte njerëzit, por asgjë s'ishte e lehtë. Derisa një aksident tragjik dhe një eksperiment i jashtëzakonshëm mjekësor e kthen serish në jete, por me instinkte të reja kafshërore.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Leksione anatomie
programme.desc: M. Griffith, E Harris. 12 vjeçari, Frank dhe dy miqtë e tij vendosin se ka ardhur koha të shohin femrën e parë nudo. Por pas një sërë telashesh dhe asnjë rezultat ata njihen me një këcimtare erotike, që do të ndryshojë gjithçka.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Io no spik Inglish
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio. Për të mos humbur vendin e punës, Sergio Colombo një burrë 40 e ca vjeç regjistrohet në një kurs në Angli për të mësuar gjuhën. Por në moshën e tij, mësimi i një gjuhe tjetër është një mision pothuajse i pamundur...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Sirena
programme.desc: 2016. Një biznesmen i pamëshirshëm me dobësi për vajzat e bukura, bie në dashuri me një sirenë e cila dërgohet ne tokë për të eleminuar atë dhe planet e tij që kërcënojnë habitatin e tyre.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Spiuni
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy, Owen Wilson. Një boksier profesionist, duhet të ndihmojë një agjent sekret të rigjejë një avion spiun mjaft të avancuar, që ka rënë në duart e një trafikanti ndërkombëtar armësh...
programme.category: Komedi
aksion

programme.title: Doxhboll
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn. Loja 'Topa Djegës' në Amerikë quhet Doxhboll. Madje është disiplinë sportive dhe një skuadër e përbërë nga njerëz të zakonshëm po lufton me mish e me shpirt që ta fitojë, sepse palestra e tyre është në rrezik.
programme.category: Komedi/Sport

programme.title: Te thyesh rregullat
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx, Gabrielle Union. Frymëzuar nga e dashura, që sapo e ka lënë, një djalë publikon për të gjithë meshkujt një libër mbi ndarjet, gjë që e kthen atë në shkrimtarin më të famshëm.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Pushimet e Mr. Bean
programme.desc: Në aventurën e tij më të fundit, mbreti i ngatërresave Mr. Bean, shkon me pushime në Francë. Ashtu siç e ka zakon vetëm ai, kudo shkel, gjithçka shkon si mos më keq dhe pas largimit të tij, Franca nuk do të jetë më njësoj.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: E ja ku vjen Poli
programme.desc: B.Stiller, J.Aniston. Pasi gruaja e tradhton gjatë muajit të mjaltit, Rubeni, takon rastësisht një vajzë që e kishte njohur që në 8-vjeçare. Megjithese ajo s'është gati për një lidhje serioze, gjerat marrin një rrjedhe të papritur për të dy.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Festa vazhdon
programme.desc: Ëndrra e Ouenit është të bëhet yll i muzikës hip hop. Por kur bëhet i famshëm për arsyen e gabuar dhe karriera e tij shkatërrohet pa filluar, ai dhe miku i tij kanë vetëm një natë kohë për ta përmbysur situatën dhe të ëndërrojnë sërish.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Dashuri në distancë
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Justin Long. Pasi bie në dashuri gjatë qëndrimit të saj të shkurtër në Nju Jork, një vajzë kaliforniane dhe i dashuri i saj, përpiqen me të gjitha forcat që të mbajnë gjallë romancën e tyre.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Krishtlindje në Jug
programme.desc: 2017. Massimo Boldi, Biagio Izzo, Anna Tatangelo. Ambrogio dhe Peppino po festojnë Krishtlindjet sëbashku me familjet. Kur zbulojnë se djemtë e tyre kanë takim me dy vajza, vendosin ti ndihmojnë që takimi tu shkojë sa më mirë.
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: I prerë për tregti
programme.desc: Jeremy Piven, Ving Rhames, James Brolin. Një shitës mjaft i zoti dhe skuadra e tij, brenda një fundjave duhet të shesin 200 makina dhe të tregojnë se kur bëhet fjalë për mashtrim, tregti dhe të papritura, nuk ka tjetër si ata...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vdekja me fytyrë gruaje
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Goldie Hawn, Bruce Willis. Një aktore dhe një shkrimtare luftojnë pambarimisht për një kirurg plastik dhe për sekretin e bukurisë së përjetshme...
programme.category: Komedi e zezë

programme.title: E dua Hakebin
programme.desc: Ata janë burrë e grua e dedektivë krejt të ndryshëm nga dedektivët e tjerë. Ata merren me çeshtje ekzistenciale. Nga ato çeshtje që të lenë pa gjumë gjithë natën... siç është çeshtja e Albertit.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mr. Bean kthehet sërish
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Mr. Bean, mallkimi
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Dashuri dhe ndarje
programme.desc: Gina Rodriguez. Menjëherë pas një ndarjeje të papritur dhe të dhimbshme, një e re ëndërrimtare përgatitet për një fillim të ri sfidues. Por, përpara se të përqafojë jetën e re, atë e pret një aventurë e fundit me mikeshat e saj të vjetra.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Përshëndetje nga unë, Doris
programme.desc: Sally Field, Max Greenfield, Tyne Daly. Me ndihmën e mikes më të mirë dhe mbesës, një grua 60 e ca vjeçare thur një plan për të bërë për vete një koleg shumë më të ri në moshë...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Komikët 3
programme.desc: Renato Pozzetto dhe Paolo Villaggio. rikthehen në rolin e dy personazheve të pafat dhe të paaftë, të cilët në çdo punë që fillojnë i hapin vetes dhe të tjerëve një mal me telashe.
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Po të lë sepse të dua shumë
programme.desc: Alessandro Siani, Mariana Braga. Një i ri që braktiset nga e dashura me pretekstin se e do shumë, takohet e bie në dashuri me një vajzë braziliane. Por kur e dashura kthehet pas disa muajsh, fillon edhe dilema e madhe...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Mjaft me dashuri
programme.desc: Rene Zellweger, Ewan McGregor. Kjo komedi romantike na çon në Nju Jorkun e vitit 1962, ku një gazetar me famën e një Don Zhuani duket se po dashurohet marrëzisht pas një shkrimtareje të njohur feministe.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Misioni për në hënë
programme.desc: Në rast dështimi të misionit "Apollo 11", CIA ka në plan që të bindë regjisorin e famshëm Stanley Kubrick të xhirojë një ulje të rreme në hënë. Por një ngatërresë e vogël, ndërlikon paksa misionin...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Producentët
programme.desc: Nathan Lane, Matthew Broderick. Max Bialystock, ish-producenti i suksesshëm teatri, do t'i kthehet sërish karierës. Por paratë dhe suksesi jo gjithmonë e bëjnë rrugën bashkë. Bialystock do të zgjedhë këtë herë paratë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Këngët e vjedhura
programme.desc: Frenk është përpjekur gjithë jetën të bëhet një yll i muzikës, por pa sukses. Kur gjen bllokun me tekste këngesh të shokut të zhdukur, ai vendos t'i prezantojë ato si të vetat dhe fama vjen menjëherë.Deri kur miku i tij shfaqet sërsh.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mashtrimi s'ndalet
programme.desc: Uma Thurman, Tim Roth, Alice Eve, Sofía Vergara. Për të shmangur shlyerjen e borxhit që i kanë gangsteres seksi Irina, nje çift mashtruesish arratisen në Hollivud dhe kurdisin vjedhjen e një xhevahiri që mund t'i shpëtojë nga telashet...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Si të zbusësh një bashkëshort
programme.desc: Një psikologe terapiste që ka vënë emër duke ndihmuar çiftet në krizë, e gjen veten në pozitë të vështirë kur duhet të zgjidhë problemet e martesës së saj, dhe vendos të praktikojë një metodë të pazakontë psikologjike me burrin e saj.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Natë vajzash
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon, Zoë Kravitz. Pesë shoqe që nga koha e universitetit bashkohen për një festë beqarie, por gjerat marrin një kthesë të paparishkuar gjatë një nate me një striptist.
programme.category: Komedi e zezë

programme.title: 21 vjeç - Natë e çmendur
programme.desc: Justin Chon. Një student i shkëlqyer, bindet nga dy shokë që të festojë ditëlindjen, edhe pse të nesërmen ka një intervistë shumë te rëndësishme pune... Por nata do të marrë një kthesë të çmendur me aventura nga më të pabesueshmet...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Betimi
programme.desc: 2018. Ike Barinholtz, Tiffany Haddish. Kur Shtëpia e Bardhë u kërkon qytetarëve të firmosin një pakt besueshmërie ndaj Presidentit, anëtarët e një familjeje me bindje të ndryshme politike, kthehen kundër njëri-tjetrit gjatë darkës së Falenderimeve.
programme.category: Komedi e zezë

programme.title: All eyez on me:Legjenda e Tupak Shakur
programme.desc: Historia e pathënë e reperit, aktorit, poetit dhe aktivitstit Tupak Shakur, nisur nga ditët e para në Nju Jork, deri në shndërrimin e një prej zërave më me influencë në të gjithë botën, dhe vdekjes së parakohëshme në moshën 25-vjeçare.
programme.category: Biografi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Ajër
programme.desc: Norman Reedus, Djimon Hounsou. Në të ardhmen e afërt, oksigjeni në Tokë nuk ekziston dhe 2 inxhinierë të ngarkuar me misionin e ruajtes së shpresës së fundit të njerëzimit, rrezikojnë të shkatërrojnë njëri-tjetrin...
programme.category: Fantashkencë-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Shenjtorë dhe ushtarë 3 Lufta e tankeve
programme.desc: Fundi i Luftës II Botërore. Pasi zbulojnë se tanke gjermane janë gati për sulm, një ekip ushtarësh amerikanë të keqarmatosur, mes frikës dhe tensionit, vendosin të ndalojë me çdo kusht planin e nazistëve për të sulmuar aleatët.
programme.category: Aksion
luftë

programme.title: Gjuetarët e fantazmave
programme.desc: Filmi ikonë i viteve 1980, rikthehet me një kastë me disa nga komedianet më të mira! Pas pushtimit të Manhatanit nga fantazmat, katër gra entuziaste për ngjarjet paranormale, bashkojnë forcat për të eliminuar rrezikun...
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Sparkle
programme.desc: Jordin Sparks, Whitney Houston. Detroitin 1960. Edhe pse nëna e tyre nuk i ka lejuar kurrë të këndojnë jashtë korit të kishës Sparkle, bashkë me dy motrat, formojnë një grup muzikor... Por bashkë me famën, vijnë edhe problemet...
programme.category: Muzikë
dramë Sub-Ang

programme.title: Eskobari: Parajsa e humbur
programme.desc: Benicio Del Toro, Josh Hutcherson. Kur një i ri kanadez bie në dashuri me mbesën e Pablo Eksobarit, jeta e tij vihet në rrezik, pasi pak e nga pak ai fillon të përfshihet në biznesin e rrezikshëm të familjes...

programme.title: Hakmarrësit
programme.desc: Chris Hemsworth, Robert Downey, Jr. Kur bota përballet me shkatërrimin e sigurt, drejtori i një agjencie ndërkombëtare të sigurisë, do të mbledhë të gjithë heronjtë e botës për t'u përballur me Lokin dhe ushtrinë e tij gjigante...
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Nuk flas më
programme.desc: James Gandolfini, Julia Louis-Dreyfus. Një nënë e divorcuar fillon një romancë me një burrë gjithashtu të divorcuar. Por kur zbulon si ai është ish-burri i mikes së saj të re, fillojnë dhe dilemat e përshtypjeve të para dhe mundësive të dyta.

programme.title: Mbreti i tregtarëve të drogës

krim-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Syri i qiellit
programme.desc: Helen Mirren, Alan Rickman. Një mision për të eliminuar disa terroristë ndërlikohet kur një vajzë e vogël futet në rrezen e shpërthimit të raketës nga një dron, duke filluar një debat ndërkombëtar për rreziqet dhe pasojat e luftës moderne.
programme.category: Thriller-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Mësuesja e anglishtes
programme.desc: Julianne Moore, Michael Angarano. Jeta e një mësueseje anglishteje do të ndryshojë rrënjësisht, kur ajo ritakohet me një ish student, i cili sapo ka dështuar si dramaturg në Nju Jork...
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Sulm për mbijetesë 2
programme.desc: 2014. Pasi mendontë se kish rënë në qetësi, Rama detyrohet të përfshihet në një mision të ri, që të sigurojë mbrojtje për familjen e tij. Ai duhet të infiltrohet në një bandë të Xhakartës, për të zbardhur korrupsionin në forcat e policisë.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Markat
programme.desc: Në një shoqëri ku korporatat gjigante kontrollojnë gjithçka, një njeri zbulon konspiracionin e rrezikshëm. Por këmbëngulja e tij për të treguar të vërtetën do ta përballë me forca të errëta sekrete, të cilat nuk ndalen përpara askujt.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Romeo dhe Zhulieta
programme.desc: Kryevepra e Uilliam Shekspir, përshtatet me mjeshtëri nga skenarsiti fitues i çmimit Oskar, Julian Fellowes. Regja Carlo Carlei. Douglas Booth dhe kandidatja për çmimin Oskar, Hailee Steinfeld në rolin e Romeos dhe Zhulietës...
programme.category: Romance-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Zoti Manglehorn
programme.desc: Al Pacino, Holly Hunter. Zemërthyer nga gruaja që dashuronte dhe e humbi shumë vite më parë, zoti Manglehorn, një çelësabërës i vetmuar, përpiqet të rifillojë jetën e tij me ndihmën e një mikeje të re...
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper, Ema Stone. Një kontratues ushtarak i suksesshëm rikthehet për punë në bazën hapësinore të Hauait. Atje lidh kontaktet me ish-të dashurën, por padashur, bie në dashuri me kapitenen që i caktuan për ta shoqëruar.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Adhurueset e jogës
programme.desc: Johnny Depp, Lily-Rose Depp, Harley Quinn Smith. Dy adoleshente, adhuruese të jogës, në bashkëpunim me hetuesin Guy Lapointe, luftojnë kundër një qënie djallëzore që rrezikon planet e festës së tyre të shumëpritur.
programme.category: Horror
Komedi-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Çfarë dinte Mejzi
programme.desc: Julianne Moore, Steve Coogan. Historia e Mejzit, një vajze të vogël nga Nju Jork, e gjendur në mes të ndarjes së prindërve dhe betejës së tyre për të fituar kujdestarinë e saj. Gjithçka e parë përmes syve të saj...
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Viti më i dhunshëm
programme.desc: Oscar Isaac. Në vitin 1981, statistikisht viti më i dhunshëm në historinë e Nju Jorkut, një biznesmen karburantesh përpiqet të mbrojë interesat dhe familjen e tij. Por kur biznesi i tij bëhet shënjestër e vjedhjeve, ai merr përsipër që të mbrohet ve.
programme.category: Krim-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Stacioni i numrave
programme.desc: John Cusack, Malin Akerman. Një agjent special, merr në mbrojtje një 'lexuese' të kodeve sekrete të CIA-s... Por kur qendra sulmohet, ata duhet të gjejnë një zgjidhje para se të jetë shumë vonë...
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Fqinjët
programme.desc: Seth Rogen, Rose Byrne, Zac Efron. Pasi detyrohen të jetojnë pranë një shtëpie që përdoret nga një vëllazëri studentësh, një çift i ri me një fëmijë të vogël, bëjnë gjithçka që munden për t'i përzënë fqinjët.
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Biri i shtatë
programme.desc: Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges. Një luftëtar legjendar, stërvit një djalosh me aftësi mbinatyrore, për t'ju kundërvënë një shtrige shpirtkeqe, e cila me ushtrinë e saj të përbindëshve i ka hapur luftë njerëzimit...
programme.category: Epik-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Gërmimi
programme.desc: Një adoleshente dhe babai i saj udhëtojnë në një hënë të largët, në kërkim të pasurive të tokës së saj. Por dikush tjetër endet në pyllin toksik të hënës dhe kërkimi i tyre kthehet shpejt në një luftë të dëshpëruar për mbijetesë.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Mallkimi i pyllit
programme.desc: Kur një kryefamiljar londinez tranferon familjen e tij në shtëpi të izoluar në Irlandë për arsye pune, zbulon se pylli përreth është i banuar nga krijesa demoniake që duan diçka prej tij.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Autostopisti
programme.desc: (2007). N.McDonough. Kur ndaluan buzë rrugës, Xhimi dhe Grejsi s'mund ta merrnin me mend se po hipnin në makinë një vrasës psikopat. Atij arritën t'i shpëtojnë, por tashmë kanë policinë pas e vetëm një rrugë për të provuar pafajësinë e tyre.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Fytyrë engjëlli
programme.desc: Daniel Bruhl, Kate Beckinsale. Bazuar ne historinë e vërtetë, ku një studente amerikane akuzohet për vrasje në Itali. Një gazetare dhe një producent filmash, përfshihen tërësisht në çështjen më të diskutuar të kohës.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Telefonata e një të panjohuri
programme.desc: 2006.Camilla Belle. Në një shtëpi luksoze ne majë të kodrës, Jill është ftuar të bëjë dadon për fëmijët e dy miqve pasanikë të të atit. Mbremja duket e qete. Dikur bie telefoni. Zeri në telefon është kercenues dhe Jill bie ne panik...
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Kabina telefonike
programme.desc: Colin Farell. Një dramë e rëndë që ndodh brenda dhe rreth një kabine telefonike ne zemer të New York-ut. Një njeri i zënë ne kurth, nën shenjestren e një snajperi po i paguan shtrenjte genjeshtrat dhe mashtrimet e thena.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Hëna
programme.desc: Ndërkohë që kontratës së tij 3 vjeçare si minator në Hënë po i vjen fundi, njeriu i vetëm (Sam Rockwell) që ndodhet aty, bën një zbulim që vendos në dilemë gjithçka që ai ka njohur deri më tani...
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Të vërtetat e fshehura
programme.desc: Harrison Ford, Michelle Pfeiffer. Vegime të frikshme, zëra misterioze, sekrete që rrezikojnë te shkatërrojnë lidhjen e një çifti në dukje të lumtur.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Trilogjia Uorriker-Beteja e Fundit
programme.desc: Helena Bonham Carter. Në kapitullin e fundit, agjenti Uorriker kthehet në Europë ku do të përballet me një kryeministër që po bën gjithçka për ta kapur.
programme.category: Thriller politik

programme.title: Rruga për në Paloma
programme.desc: Pasi hakmerret për vrasjen e nënës, një njeri (Jason Momoa) merr arratinë me motorin e tij nëpër gjithë Amerikën, ku zbulon se drejtësia e ka një çmim.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Xhelati amerikan
programme.desc: 2019. Donald Sutherland. Një pengmarrje e transmetuar drejtpërdrejtë në mediat sociale kthehet në një seancë gjyqësore ndaj një gjyqtari. Këte herë janë shikuesit që vihen në rolin e jurisë, duke vendosur nëse ai duhet të jetojë apo të vdesë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Biri i krimit
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor. Një i ri miqësohet me një gangster me emër, ndërkohë qe të dy ndodhen në burg. Pasi arrijnë të arratisen dhe të kryejnë disa grabitje spekakolare, ata formojnë një lidhje ku secili ka nevojë për ndihmën e tjetrit...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Fshati
programme.desc: Një komunitet i izoluar në një fshat të vogël rron me frikën e disa krijesave të fshehura në pyllin përreth. Dikush merr frikën në sy dhe shkon deri atje ku askush s'kish guxuar dhe gjendet perpara një të vërtete tronditese!
programme.category: Mister

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: Një oficer policie në Kopenhagë që kërkon drejtësi për vrasjen e partnerit të tij nga ISIS, përfshihet në një garë të rrezikshme me një agjent të dyshimtë të CIA-s, i cili ka plane të tjera për vrasësin.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Tri vrasjet
programme.desc: 2011. Gati një vit pas një pune të shkuar keq, një vrasës me pagesë merr një tjetër detyrë që premton t'i sjelle shumë pasuri, për tri vrasje të kryera. Por ç'ka fillon si një punë e thjeshtë, shpejt kthehet në një botë të errët e të tmerrshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
Mamurluk 3
programme.desc:
The Hangover Part III: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha. When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1951261/","name":"The Hangover Part III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0NjE1MzMzODheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDY4MTQ3Mzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1951261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"umer_uf"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Only good for few Nostalgia-laughs.","reviewBody":"You know that one joke you tell at every party? It was hilarious the first time you told it. So you kept telling it over and over again. You told your mom, your friends, your wacky uncle and heck you even told it to your baby sister. Each time you tell that joke it lost some of its charm and you know this in your heart, but you keep telling it because it made you someone who was at least bearable at the office party. The Hangover Part III is THAT dreaded, self-destructive joke. 

The first The Hangover was a surprise to everyone. It was a smart, engaging and an all-around funny move. It made the three protagonists into overnight stars, along with Mr. Chow (Ken Jeong). Since The Hangover these four guys have experienced great success; Bradley Cooper has been nominated for an Oscar, Ed Helms became a little more then Andy from The Office, and Zach Galifianakis (the funniest of the bunch) starred on HBO's Bored to Death and Ken Jeong is a recurring character on Community. It's no surprise then that The Hangover made these guys in demand, and had the audience craving for more. So what better way to give the masses what they want than bringing the Wolf Pack back together for two more subpar movies. The Hangover Part III brings the crew back together for yet another wacky adventure, this time getting them to go to Tijuana and back to Vegas. There isn't really much to tell you about the plot that you can't figure out yourself. So it makes very little sense to go in any further detail about it, and I can move on to things that worked.

By far the funniest moment during the movie for my money's worth was when some girl in the theater screamed out loud after seeing one of the main character dangle for his life. The whole theater roared, and it was a genuinely hilarious moment. Too bad the same can't be said about the rest of the movie. No doubt there were some funny moments and personally the best bits of the movie were when Melissa Mccarthy was on the screen. Some of the other funniest moments were throwbacks to the original. I found myself doing a lot of "ooh I remember that from the first movie. Ha ha that reference is funny." Unfortunately that is all this movie is, it's a reminder of how great The Hangover was and we should nostalgia- laugh (is something I just made up) because we once thought there was no one funnier than Zack Galifianakis. Other than that any original content was drab at best. 

The best laughs came from all the supporting characters, and the 'Big 3' it felt like were just there to collect the pay check. Bradly Cooper was by far the worst of the bunch. It's hard to believe that this is the same guy who was nominated for an Oscar not very long ago. Ed Helms and Zack Galifianakis were at least trying.

It was the overall chemistry of the three characters that made the original so great. The Hangover was a perfect recipe of Mac and Cheese where you threw in random ingredients and IT WAS THE BEST MAC AND CHEESE YOU EVER MADE! You tried replicating the original time after time, and tasted nothing but cheese and disappointment. It was just another Mac and Cheese. Sure it was served its purpose of feeding your broke student ass, but you yearned for that perfect gourmet Mac and Cheese fit to serve Gordon Ramsay himself. 

The Hangover Part III is not a movie for people who are looking for genuine comedy. There are some very funny moments but the cheap laughs far outnumber the good ones. If you're going in expecting a repeat of The Hangover then don't waste your time and money. If you were disappointed by The Hangover Part II this movie will only throw salt on your wounds. It's sad to see such an initially brilliant trilogy end like this. Hangover 3 was nothing but one last attempt at squeezing every last dollar from the franchise. The Hangover Part III gets 5 nostalgia-laughs out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":302444,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2013-05-29","keywords":"heart attack,giraffe,breast implant,prostitute,karaoke bar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Version 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2312742425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3MjI4OTk1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjMyNDczOQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3MjI4OTk1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjMyNDczOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This time, there's no wedding. No bachelor party. What could go wrong, right? But when the Wolfpack hits the road, all bets are off."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0302108/","name":"Zach Galifianakis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159180/","name":"Ed Helms"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221959/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0563301/","name":"Craig Mazin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524190/","name":"Jon Lucas"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1951261, Title: The Hangover Part III, --- Description: The Hangover Part III: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha. When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1951261/","name":"The Hangover Part III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0NjE1MzMzODheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDY4MTQ3Mzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1951261/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"umer_uf","dateCreated":"2013-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Only good for few Nostalgia-laughs.","reviewBody":"You know that one joke you tell at every party? It was hilarious the first time you told it. So you kept telling it over and over again. You told your mom, your friends, your wacky uncle and heck you even told it to your baby sister. Each time you tell that joke it lost some of its charm and you know this in your heart, but you keep telling it because it made you someone who was at least bearable at the office party. The Hangover Part III is THAT dreaded, self-destructive joke. 

The first The Hangover was a surprise to everyone. It was a smart, engaging and an all-around funny move. It made the three protagonists into overnight stars, along with Mr. Chow (Ken Jeong). Since The Hangover these four guys have experienced great success; Bradley Cooper has been nominated for an Oscar, Ed Helms became a little more then Andy from The Office, and Zach Galifianakis (the funniest of the bunch) starred on HBO's Bored to Death and Ken Jeong is a recurring character on Community. It's no surprise then that The Hangover made these guys in demand, and had the audience craving for more. So what better way to give the masses what they want than bringing the Wolf Pack back together for two more subpar movies. The Hangover Part III brings the crew back together for yet another wacky adventure, this time getting them to go to Tijuana and back to Vegas. There isn't really much to tell you about the plot that you can't figure out yourself. So it makes very little sense to go in any further detail about it, and I can move on to things that worked.

By far the funniest moment during the movie for my money's worth was when some girl in the theater screamed out loud after seeing one of the main character dangle for his life. The whole theater roared, and it was a genuinely hilarious moment. Too bad the same can't be said about the rest of the movie. No doubt there were some funny moments and personally the best bits of the movie were when Melissa Mccarthy was on the screen. Some of the other funniest moments were throwbacks to the original. I found myself doing a lot of "ooh I remember that from the first movie. Ha ha that reference is funny." Unfortunately that is all this movie is, it's a reminder of how great The Hangover was and we should nostalgia- laugh (is something I just made up) because we once thought there was no one funnier than Zack Galifianakis. Other than that any original content was drab at best. 

The best laughs came from all the supporting characters, and the 'Big 3' it felt like were just there to collect the pay check. Bradly Cooper was by far the worst of the bunch. It's hard to believe that this is the same guy who was nominated for an Oscar not very long ago. Ed Helms and Zack Galifianakis were at least trying.

It was the overall chemistry of the three characters that made the original so great. The Hangover was a perfect recipe of Mac and Cheese where you threw in random ingredients and IT WAS THE BEST MAC AND CHEESE YOU EVER MADE! You tried replicating the original time after time, and tasted nothing but cheese and disappointment. It was just another Mac and Cheese. Sure it was served its purpose of feeding your broke student ass, but you yearned for that perfect gourmet Mac and Cheese fit to serve Gordon Ramsay himself. 

The Hangover Part III is not a movie for people who are looking for genuine comedy. There are some very funny moments but the cheap laughs far outnumber the good ones. If you're going in expecting a repeat of The Hangover then don't waste your time and money. If you were disappointed by The Hangover Part II this movie will only throw salt on your wounds. It's sad to see such an initially brilliant trilogy end like this. Hangover 3 was nothing but one last attempt at squeezing every last dollar from the franchise. programme.title: Argo
Argo
programme.desc:
Argo: Directed by Ben Affleck. With Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, Alan Arkin, John Goodman. Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1024648/","name":"Argo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzljNjY3MDYtYzc0Ni00YjU0LWIyNDUtNTE0ZDRiMGExMjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1024648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CalRhys"},"dateCreated":"2013-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intense Film Packed With Emotion","reviewBody":"Argo is the political thriller based on the 1979 Iranian hostage situation in which 6 Americans were left to fend for themselves in the centre of Tehran. CIA Operative Tony Mendez (played by Ben Affleck) is sent into Iran to evacuate the Americans out safely under the cover of being a film production crew working on a picture called 'Argo'.

The film is absolutely amazing and definitely one of the best films I've seen in a long time, throughout 2012 and 2013 so far we have been treated with some great films such as Skyfall, Django Unchained, Life of Pi, Les Miserables, Zero Dark Thirty and more, but in my own personal opinion Argo takes the bait as the best of them all. Proof is present as it won 3 BAFTA's for best picture, best director and best editing, also nominated for a further 8 Oscars in 85th Academy Awards.

The film is packed with a sense of threat, peril and intensity all portrayed exceptionally well through the ensemble cast including Ben Affleck (The Town), John Goodman (Big Lebowski), Bryan Cranston (Breaking Bad), Alan Arkin (Edward Scissorhands) and Victor Garber (Titanic). The ending is by far the most intense ending I have seen in a long time, visually presented in such an astounding way.

Director Ben Affleck started out his auteur career after his directional debut Gone Baby Gone became critically acclaimed, three years later The Town came out with an Oscar nomination. Now 2 years on we have Argo, Affleck's best film by far."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":589744,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"iran,hostage,u.s. embassy,escape,american embassy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Picture","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1537319449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5410196/","name":"Tony Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2646452/","name":"Joshuah Bearman"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Aquaman: Directed by James Wan. With Jason Momoa, Amber Heard, Willem Dafoe, Patrick Wilson. Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1477834/","name":"Aquaman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk5ODg0OTU5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ3MDY3NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1477834/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"brian-toone"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Franchise","reviewBody":"And it has nothing to do with the comic books.

Bad and pointless

What is the point of this film? A big beefcake? Because that's literally the only storyline this mess has going for it. Pointless characters, horrible CGI for this modern time, bad acting, I could continue. If I had went to the theater to see this, I would be trying to get my money back. I gave it a 3 only because of the nostalgia I have for Aquaman. That's all that is good about this excuse of an action/family film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":414497,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-12-21","keywords":"tattooed man,damsel in distress,brawl,hand to hand combat,fight to the death","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3588536857","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MGIyZDktZWI2ZC00NjBiLTkwYWItNzgwZmFjMzJlZTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MGIyZDktZWI2ZC00NjBiLTkwYWItNzgwZmFjMzJlZTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Arthur Curry learns that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis and must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world in 'Aquaman,' directed by James Wan and starring Jason Momoa."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597388/","name":"Jason Momoa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1720028/","name":"Amber Heard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179825/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424901/","name":"David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3263825/","name":"Will Beall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424315/","name":"Geoff Johns"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Inside Man
Insajder
programme.desc:
Inside Man: Directed by Spike Lee. With Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer. A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454848/","name":"Inside Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc4MjA2ZDgtOGY3YS00NDYzLTlmNTEtYWMxMzcwZjgzYWNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shadowycat"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"High time the academy gives Spike Lee some respect!","reviewBody":"Whether I was into the subject or not, there's always a filmmaker at work in a Spike Lee film... he's one moviemaker who never loses sight of being a filmmaker first and foremost, and he's absolutely outdone himself with INSIDE MAN, a taut thriller which avoids the colloquialism that alienated mainstream audiences from some of his earlier work.

If you've seen the trailer or heard anything about this pic, you have been misled. Everything I heard left me feeling like yeah, OK, I'm going for Denzel. Denzel vs. Clive Owen will be interesting.

From the first shots and opening credits, you are submerged in artistic vision, and a finely honed piece of work the likes of which I haven't seen in years. I'd almost give this one a ten.. and I don't hand out tens freely. I do not want to spoil this. You have to walk in cold, and let this film grab you by the short and curlies.

This is one film where there isn't a spare frame or wasted cheap shot. Every zinger zings, and there are laughs too, laughs at merciful intervals to break the tension and remind an audience on the edges of its seats that movie-going's supposed to be entertaining, dammit. The cinematography is brilliant, and the music is fantastic - true cinematic score, true genius. I can't praise this one enough.

Christopher Plummer is superb, in what is (perhaps coincidentally) an ironic bit of casting. Jodie Foster rises to a challenging persona with aplomb and ease, and my only complaint of the entire exercise is that her character's name 'Madeline White' is perhaps a little cliché. Beyond that, there isn't a filmmaker alive who brings New York to the screen with anything approximating Spike Lee's vision.

It seems there hasn't been a lot of junket for this one, and that Spike Lee's presence has been downplayed... as if the studio downplayed the fact that this is a Spike Lee film slightly, until the word was out that this film is over and beyond what an audience might already expect from one of his films.

So... let me just say.. man o man this is a cinematic mind-blowing amazing one and a half hours... it's brilliant, tight, funny, articulate, intense, and high time the academy gives Spike Lee some respect.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":353578,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2006-06-28","keywords":"bank,bank robber,hostage,robber,negotiation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Inside Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi495889689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwYjE0MDItYjA4Zi00NTMyLWI5NWItZDA2ZjQ5MWRhMzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwYjE0MDItYjA4Zi00NTMyLWI5NWItZDA2ZjQ5MWRhMzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Inside Man"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000149/","name":"Jodie Foster"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000490/","name":"Spike Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897957/","name":"Russell Gewirtz"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

From the first shots and opening credits, you are submerged in artistic vision, and a finely honed piece of work the likes of which I haven't seen in years. This is one film where there isn't a spare frame or wasted cheap shot. Every zinger zings, and there are laughs too, laughs at merciful intervals to break the tension and remind an audience on the edges of its seats that movie-going's supposed to be entertaining, dammit. Christopher Plummer is superb, in what is (perhaps coincidentally) an ironic bit of casting. Jodie Foster rises to a challenging persona with aplomb and ease, and my only complaint of the entire exercise is that her character's name 'Madeline White' is perhaps a little cliché. It seems there hasn't been a lot of junket for this one, and that Spike Lee's presence has been downplayed... as if the studio downplayed the fact that this is a Spike Lee film slightly, until the word was out that this film is over and beyond what an audience might already expect from one of his films.

So... let me just say.. man o man this is a cinematic mind-blowing amazing one and a half hours... it's brilliant, tight, funny, articulate, intense, and high time the academy gives Spike Lee some respect.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":353578,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2006-06-28","keywords":"bank,bank robber,hostage,robber,negotiation","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Inside Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi495889689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwYjE0MDItYjA4Zi00NTMyLWI5NWItZDA2ZjQ5MWRhMzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwYjE0MDItYjA4Zi00NTMyLWI5NWItZDA2ZjQ5MWRhMzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Inside Man","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000149/","name":"Jodie Foster"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000490/","name":"Spike Lee"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029134/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897957/","name":"Russell Gewirtz"],"duration":"PT2H9M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
Bilo jednom u Meksiku
programme.desc:
Once Upon a Time in Mexico: Directed by Robert Rodriguez. With Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Johnny Depp, Mickey Rourke. Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0285823/","name":"Once Upon a Time in Mexico","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDg5OTcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjI1MTIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0285823/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sporadically enjoyable but the plot is a total shambles","reviewBody":"El Mariachi has long quit the gunslinger trade but is offered a chance to avenge the death of his wife and daughter by slightly unhinged CIA agent Sands. Sands is trying to control a coup by allowing it to happy but then having the victor killed as soon as he takes power. However the involvement of drug lord Barillo and various other groups soon complicate matters causing bullets to come from all sides.

After taking an unlikely trilogy to box office success, Rodriguez returns to the film series that basically brought him the success he has today  El Mariachi. While the first film in the series was a very cheap movie, the second and the third swelled with budget and star names. Here the action is constant and is very stylised. This is not to say that it is all edge of the seat stuff, but if spectacle and bangs is all you are after then this should do the job nicely. None of it moves slowly simply because it has more than enough going on to fill the time  but that's the problem to be honest.

The plot has so much going on but none of it actually fits together or makes a whole lot of sense. After a while any attempt to put things together in my head became a wasted effort  clearly the point here was that the style and gloss was meant to be everything. The other downside to this is that some characters are so poorly used that it's a wonder as to why they were even written in. Some cameos are fantastic and make the film. I refer to, of course, Depp, who, for the second time this summer, manages to make a film better by his sheer witty performance. He owes a lot to the writing of the character but he carries him off superbly and is darkly funny. However Rouke, Blades, Mendes, Dafoe all have little to do and, with some of them, are just clutter. Banderas does his usual stuff with style but his character doesn't have the depth that the flashbacks I think are meant to give him  again this is style over substance.

I still quite enjoyed the film but couldn't help but feel it was less the sum of it's parts. With a budget, big names and lots of action I was surprised that the cluttered, shambolic plot managed to take away from the `fun' as much as it did  but it did. Quite enjoyable but you need a LOT of style to win compensate for the total lack of substance."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":157279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-12-17","keywords":"mexico,bikini,outnumbered,mariachi,playing electric guitar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Once Upon a Time in Mexico","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi813540889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkNzMzZjItZTllOS00MmMwLWJmYzYtOGFiMWVjODMyNjUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkNzMzZjItZTllOS00MmMwLWJmYzYtOGFiMWVjODMyNjUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Once Upon a Time in Mexico"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035848/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

Sands is trying to control a coup by allowing it to happy but then having the victor killed as soon as he takes power. However the involvement of drug lord Barillo and various other groups soon complicate matters causing bullets to come from all sides.

After taking an unlikely trilogy to box office success, Rodriguez returns to the film series that basically brought him the success he has today  El Mariachi. While the first film in the series was a very cheap movie, the second and the third swelled with budget and star names. Here the action is constant and is very stylised. This is not to say that it is all edge of the seat stuff, but if spectacle and bangs is all you are after then this should do the job nicely. None of it moves slowly simply because it has more than enough going on to fill the time  but that's the problem to be honest.

The plot has so much going on but none of it actually fits together or makes a whole lot of sense. After a while any attempt to put things together in my head became a wasted effort  clearly the point here was that the style and gloss was meant to be everything. The other downside to this is that some characters are so poorly used that it's a wonder as to why they were even written in. Some cameos are fantastic and make the film. I refer to, of course, Depp, who, for the second time this summer, manages to make a film better by his sheer witty performance. He owes a lot to the writing of the character but he carries him off superbly and is darkly funny. However Rouke, Blades, Mendes, Dafoe all have little to do and, with some of them, are just clutter. Banderas does his usual stuff with style but his character doesn't have the depth that the flashbacks I think are meant to give him  again this is style over substance.

I still quite enjoyed the film but couldn't help but feel it was less the sum of it's parts. With a budget, big names and lots of action I was surprised that the cluttered, shambolic plot managed to take away from the `fun' as much as it did  but it did. Quite enjoyable but you need a LOT of style to win compensate for the total lack of substance.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":157279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-12-17","keywords":"mexico,bikini,outnumbered,mariachi,playing electric guitar","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Once Upon a Time in Mexico","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi813540889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkNzMzZjItZTllOS00MmMwLWJmYzYtOGFiMWVjODMyNjUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkNzMzZjItZTllOS00MmMwLWJmYzYtOGFiMWVjODMyNjUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Once Upon a Time in Mexico","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035848/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"],"duration":"PT1H42M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gravity
Gravitacija
programme.desc: Gravity: Directed by Alfonso Cuarón. With Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris, Orto Ignatiussen. Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1454468/","name":"Gravity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE5MzYwMzYxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk4MTk0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1454468/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stars in Space","reviewBody":"Visually stunning. A real first in the technical department and presumably that was the extent of its intent. None of the great themes of Kubrick's 1968 masterpiece "2001: A Space Odyssey", are present here. This is a superlative, 90 odd minutes of remarkable beauty but the 90 odd minutes become really long because, just like the heroine we have so little to cling on to, story wise. It seems petty to criticize a film of this kind for whatever it doesn't accomplish because what it means to accomplish, it does in spectacular fashion. I just felt that I was served a glorious appetizer without a main course. Two huge stars in space Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. Why? If the idea was to dazzled us with something we had never seen before, great unknown actors would have added an extra something. Kubrick used Keir Dullea in "2001: A Space Odyssey", yes, Keir Dullea, or as Noel Coward put it, Keir Dullea, gone tomorrow. We know that if Sandra Bullock was in charge she, one way or another, will land safely. She's terrific, don't get me wrong, but I wasn't as worried about her as I should have been. The last problem was the score. Why? A standard horror/action flick musical score with cheap shots here and there. I think the purity of the work needed to be extended on every department. Now, putting all that aside, director Alfonso Cuaron must be applauded and I strongly recommend you to run and see it in the biggest screen you can find and in 3D.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":790644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-10-09","keywords":"space station,female protagonist,sole survivor,self sacrifice,long take","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Main Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2340006169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NDY0MjM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA0NzIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NDY0MjM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA0NzIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.\r\n\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000438/","name":"Ed Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0164586/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190861/","name":"Jonás Cuarón"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Aquaman
Aquaman
programme.desc:
Aquaman: Directed by James Wan. With Jason Momoa, Amber Heard, Willem Dafoe, Patrick Wilson. Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1477834/","name":"Aquaman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk5ODg0OTU5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ3MDY3NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1477834/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"brian-toone"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Franchise","reviewBody":"And it has nothing to do with the comic books.

Bad and pointless

What is the point of this film? A big beefcake? Because that's literally the only storyline this mess has going for it. Pointless characters, horrible CGI for this modern time, bad acting, I could continue. If I had went to the theater to see this, I would be trying to get my money back. I gave it a 3 only because of the nostalgia I have for Aquaman. That's all that is good about this excuse of an action/family film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":414497,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-12-21","keywords":"tattooed man,damsel in distress,brawl,hand to hand combat,fight to the death","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3588536857","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MGIyZDktZWI2ZC00NjBiLTkwYWItNzgwZmFjMzJlZTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MGIyZDktZWI2ZC00NjBiLTkwYWItNzgwZmFjMzJlZTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Arthur Curry learns that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis and must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world in 'Aquaman,' directed by James Wan and starring Jason Momoa."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597388/","name":"Jason Momoa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1720028/","name":"Amber Heard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179825/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424901/","name":"David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3263825/","name":"Will Beall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424315/","name":"Geoff Johns"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Lego Movie
Lego
programme.desc:
The Lego Movie: Directed by Christopher Miller, Phil Lord. With Will Arnett, Elizabeth Banks, Craig Berry, Alison Brie. An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1490017/","name":"The Lego Movie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg4MDk1ODExN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzIyNjg3MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1490017/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mutiaraherawati"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Strong story in a very creative way","reviewBody":"If you watch the trailer and you think its just gonna be a fun stop-motion animated Lego movie, you were wrong. The Lego Movie is beyond fun. its creative and it brings back a lot childhood memories. The story was amazing, the jokes were hilarious, and they have great intention in details.

But, the most important thing, the movie remind us to be creative. Because sometimes, As we grow up, in someway, we stop being creative and just follow the rules and instruction. For adults, this movie will bring back your childhood memories and how you used to play randomly with those Lego. And for a kids, you'll just love this movie, and definitely makes you want to play with your own Lego.

totally worth watching movie! even your grandparents will enjoy this movie! 9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":334423,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2014-02-12","keywords":"lego,good cop bad cop,based on toy,construction worker,computer animation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2178131993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkyMjA1ODQzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ2NzMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkyMjA1ODQzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ2NzMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ordinary LEGO minifigure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil LEGO tyrant from gluing the universe together. programme.title: Sex and the City
Seks i grad
programme.desc:
Sex and the City: Created by Darren Star. With Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon. Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0159206/","name":"Sex and the City","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGEyNDRjM2QtY2VlYy00OWRhLWI4N2UtZTM4NDc0MGM0YzBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0159206/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fusskins"},"dateCreated":"2000-07-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sex and the City bashers be damned!!!","reviewBody":"I am a 23 year old single woman living in Manhattan and I love and relate to this show. All though I am younger and poorer than these women, and I don't get nearly as many men as they do (not to mention the fact that I'm Black!), I think this show has alot of insightful and funny things to say about being a woman in New York.

And to address the sex issue...I am so tired of the Madonna/Whore complex everyone in the country seems to be up to their eyeballs in. Get over it! Women like sex, they have sex, and they have sex with men they don't like. So what? And so what if they continue to look for Mr. Right even when they're with Mr. Right Now. What person man or woman hasn't consistently done something, seemingly at cross-purposes with their intended goal in the name of love, lust, or companionship? Stop with the tired double standards (that includes HBO's ban on full frontal male nudity on the show!)

Let's address the real issue: We all wish we were getting it as much as Samantha--even it's from just ONE person!!!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113572,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-06-06","keywords":"love life,friendship between women,friendship,singles,casual sex","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000572/","name":"Sarah Jessica Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000326/","name":"Kim Cattrall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004862/","name":"Kristin Davis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020963/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050436/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0823015/","name":"Darren Star"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sex and the City: The Sixth Season - Part 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi394723609","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI0MjIzN2YtMTlhYS00ZjM0LThkZTAtZTU4ZDdlODEzZjViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI0MjIzN2YtMTlhYS00ZjM0LThkZTAtZTU4ZDdlODEzZjViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc:
Last Week Tonight with John Oliver: With John Oliver, David Kaye, Ryan Barger, Noel MacNeal. Former Daily Show host and correspondent John Oliver brings his persona to this weekly news satire program." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3530232/","name":"Last Week Tonight with John Oliver","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk4OTBkMGUtZWI3NC00M2Y0LWJjNjAtZmVjMGNiNDMyMmViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Former Daily Show host and correspondent John Oliver brings his persona to this weekly news satire program.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3530232/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"meltinzone"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Weekly awesome energy infused injection of peace and discussion!","reviewBody":"The insane level of awesome energy John Oliver feeds the viewer can almost be felt! John cuts through the bullshit and touches on real news.

There's something about this show that I really genuinely like (and I'm an Australian). Perhaps it's the way most of us would like to already live in a world that does good and makes fun of the stupid and absurd, a bit like Japan perhaps!? Well John Oliver has us covered. Each week a much needed hit of vitality and rejuvenation gets subtly unveiled, then straight up sucker punched to us.

The views on issues are sublime, as though John has been on our planet in a future time of peace, then come back to help lube us all through the hole we're already headed for, the peace hole. The energy and views on the show are just like a pick me up to make us go a tiny bit faster.

I've just watched episode 3 and that episode alone sums up the type of people, media and just the general positive peaceful way I'd like to see humanity head.

10/10 for the sole fact we need to take a look at ourselves in a mirror and thankfully John Oliver's right there, holding up the mirror for us! If you enjoyed Chasers War On Everything, Newsroom, Real Time with Bill Maher or a slew of other 'younger trend news~ish' shows, I'd say this is well worth a look!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83234,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Short","Comedy","History"],"datePublished":"2014-04-27","keywords":"news satire,hbo,current affairs,satire,reenactment","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1056659/","name":"John Oliver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0443286/","name":"David Kaye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2175486/","name":"Ryan Barger"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0339089/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103754/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Last Week Tonight With John Oliver: Season 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3962944793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQxYTJkZWMtMjRlNC00ZDJkLThkZDgtNzU0YzFhMjMyZTczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQxYTJkZWMtMjRlNC00ZDJkLThkZDgtNzU0YzFhMjMyZTczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Last Week Tonight With John Oliver: Season 3"}}</script><metacontent="

I've just watched episode 3 and that episode alone sums up the type of people, media and just the general positive peaceful way I'd like to see humanity head.

10/10 for the sole fact we need to take a look at ourselves in a mirror and thankfully John Oliver's right there, holding up the mirror for us! If you enjoyed Chasers War On Everything, Newsroom, Real Time with Bill Maher or a slew of other 'younger trend news~ish' shows, I'd say this is well worth a look!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83234,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Short","Comedy","History"],"datePublished":"2014-04-27","keywords":"news satire,hbo,current affairs,satire,reenactment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1056659/","name":"John Oliver","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0443286/","name":"David Kaye","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2175486/","name":"Ryan Barger"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0339089/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103754/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Last Week Tonight With John Oliver: Season 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3962944793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQxYTJkZWMtMjRlNC00ZDJkLThkZDgtNzU0YzFhMjMyZTczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQxYTJkZWMtMjRlNC00ZDJkLThkZDgtNzU0YzFhMjMyZTczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Last Week Tonight With John Oliver: Season 3"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The White Lotus
Bijeli lotos
programme.desc: The White Lotus: Created by Mike White. With Murray Bartlett, Connie Britton, Jennifer Coolidge, Alexandra Daddario. Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt13406094/","name":"The White Lotus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1YjY1MWUtYWY5Yi00YTM4LTkyM2UtMDQ3NmFiYTkyYjlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13406094/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"idospasjody"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is the BEST dark comedy in years","reviewBody":"This is a gem. The writing and acting is amazing. I can't wait for every Sunday evening. I wish I wouldn't have started it so I could binge watch the hole thing. There are parts that it takes a few seconds for your brain to process and then bang OMG laugh out loud funny. Rewind watch again funny. The story telling is masterful. Only thing wrong with this show is can't find anything to it's equal wile waiting for the next one to be released.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27138,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-11","keywords":"male explicit nudity,resort,full frontal male nudity,social satire,satire","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058864/","name":"Murray Bartlett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0110168/","name":"Connie Britton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177639/","name":"Jennifer Coolidge"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193472/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925234/","name":"Mike White"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1544732697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Among the employees at The White Lotus are the fastidious resort manager Armond (Murray Bartlett), who, after a sudden trauma, begins a dramatic downward spiral - and the down-to-earth spa manager, Belinda (Natasha Rothwell) who gets taken on an emotional roller coaster ride by a needy guest. The vacationers include the Mossbacher family - Nicole (Connie Britton), a successful type-A exec, who can't help but treat her family like disobedient employees; her husband, Mark (Steve Zahn), dealing with both an embarrassing health crisis and a terminal inferiority complex; their teenaged son, Quinn (Fred Hechinger), a socially awkward gamer, experiencing the wonder of nature for the very first time; their daughter, Olivia (Sydney Sweeney), and her friend, Paula (Brittany O'Grady), sharp-tongued college sophomores who cast a sardonic eye on the lifestyles and belief systems of everyone around them. The handsome, entitled Shane Patton (Jake Lacy) is here with his beautiful bride, Rachel (Alexandra Daddario). Shane and Rachel are in the throes of young love, but as they get to know each other better in this new, intimate environment, clouds of doubt appear - and by the time Shane's intrusive mother, Kitty (Molly Shannon) surprises them with an unwelcome visit, their fairytale honeymoon has begun to unravel. And finally, there is Tanya McQuoid (Jennifer Coolidge), a wealthy, unstable woman, recovering from the death of her mother, traveling alone to the hotel, looking for love and in desperate need of a massage."}}</script><metacontent="

Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1411697/","name":"The Hangover Part II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2MTM4MzY2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQ3NzI4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1411697/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"masonsaul"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great comedy sequel","reviewBody":"Whilst the plot is basically the same as it's predecessor, The Hangover Part II is still a great comedy sequel. Once again, Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms and Zach Galifianakis are all great with really good chemistry and Ken Jeong is also great.
